chapter.text: Ccekoan i Oebbi, id Issersen Tazmamt, i uxdim iS. Aawaj, degs, ur Irri
Tewqem, iwakken a ppaaggen $ef ssxev uwaio, s$uoeS; u a pbecceo lmumnin ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar nnsen warraz igerzen
Ad ilin degs, i lebda
A ppaaggen i wid innan: "Oebbi Isaa mmi S
Ur illi wayen ssnen fellas; akken, imezwura nnsen. D awal uqbie id iff$en seg imawen nnsen. D tikerkas kan ay ssawalen
Ahat a phelkev iman ik, ar loiha nnsen, a p$weblev, imi ur uminen ara s usali agi
Ni$ Nerra i illan di tmurt, d ccbaea ines, iwakken a Neeo menyif iten, ar igiten ilhan
A Nu$al a Nerr, i illan degs, d akal ibuoen
Ne$ t$ilev d At yifri kan, akked Oaqim, ay d lwehma, ger issekniyen nne£
Mi ssoen iman nnsen ilmeeiyen deg ifri, nnan: "a Mass nne$! Efk ane$ d aeunu s$uoeK; Err a$ lameo nne$ d uuwib
Deg ifri, Nesle$ imeeeu$en nnsen, aceal iseggwasen
Sinna, Nessker iten id, a Neeo anta, ger snat n trebbuyaa, i ieesben aceal qqimen
Nekwni, ad ak Neeku, s tidep, taqsii nnsen. Nitni, ih, d ilmeeiyen, umnen s Mass nnsen. Nerna yasen nnhaya
Nesseohed ulawen nnsen, mi kren nnan: "Mass nne$ d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur nepnuju, d awez$i, ar oebbi, war Neppa, mulac a d nini awal dduni
Widak d agdud nne$. Aabden ioebbiten, war Neppa. Ay$eo ur a$ d bbwin, fellasen, adabu n uuee? Anwa i idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi
Mi ten tfuoqem, nitni akked wayen aabden war Oebbi, essoet iman nwen deg ifri. Ad awen Izraa, Mass nnwen, seg ueunu S. Ad awen Iheggi amwanes i lameo nnwen

A pwaliv iiij, mi d inqeo, iwexxeo i ifri nnsen, ar yeffus. Mi i$li, ad asen iaaddi $eo zelmev. Nitni, din, di littsaa. Ayagi seg issekniyen n Oebbi. Win Inha Oebbi, neppa ipwanha; win Itlef, ur isai, d awez$i, bab ara t inhun
Ad as tiniv ukin, nitni iisen. Ntezzi ten yeffus, zelmev. Aydi nnsen, $ef umnao, ieeel ivaoen is. Lemmer a ten twaliv, ad asen trewlev, si tugdi; a k terkeb, segsen, lefqaa

Akka ay ten id Nessenker, iwakken ad mesteqsin. Inna yiwen segsen: "aceal n lweqt ay tesaaddam"? Nnan d: "nesaadda ass ne$ ur ibbwiv wass". Nnan: "Mass nnwen Yif akw akken Izoa ay tesaaddam. Aznet ar temdint, yiwen segwen, s idrimen agi nnwen. Ad iwali anwa lqut iufan mavi, ad awen d iawi ooeeq, segs. Ad ieader iman is, iwakken ur awen ipfaq yiwen
Nitni, war ccekk, ma eoan kwen, a kwen oeomen, ne$ a kwen rren ar ddin nnsen, d$a ur trebeen, d awez$i

Akka ay sen ten Nessken, iwakken ad eoen ar lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep; u, $ef yimir, ur illi ccekk. Mi mqellaan $ef lameo nnsen, nnan: "bnut axxam sennig sen. Mass nnsen Yif akw akken iten Issen". Nnan wid iwumi iaadda wawal, $ef lameo nnsen: "a nerr, ihi, lemqam sennig sen

Ad inin: "di krav yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis kue"; u ad inin: "di semus yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis sdis", pqelliben tabavnit. U ad inin: "di ua yidsen, aydi nnsen d wis iam". Ini: "Mass iw Yif akw akken Ieoa amvan nnsen. Drus kan i t ieoan". Ur pnamar fellasen, siwa $ef wayen id ivehoen. Ur ppesteqsay yiwen fellasen
Ur qqao ta$awsa a p xedme$, s tidep, azekka
siwa ma Irad Oebbi. Mmekti d Mass ik, ma teppuv. Ini: "amar ad iyi Inhu Mass iw, ar wayen yifen ayagi di uuwab
Saaddan, deg ifri nnsen, krav twinas iseggwasen, rnan tza nniven
Ini: "Oebbi Yif akw akken Ieoa, aceal saaddan. IneS tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Amek Neppa Ipwali, Isell! Ur sain bab, war Neppa. Ur Izdukkul yiwen i useyyi S
Mel ayen ik ed ippuweeean, si Tezmamt n Mass ik. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawal iS. Ur teppafev ssoan, war Neppa, d awez$i

Uebbeo iman ik, akked wid ipnujun ar Mass nnsen, tauebeit, tameddit, pnadin udem iS. Ur ten tekkes si ger wallen ik, a pvemaav lefnun n tmeddurt n ddunit. Ur ssemeas i win iwumi Nesse$fel ul is, ar usmekti nne£, i iddan d lhawiyya s, iwumi iffuhri lameo

Ini: "tidep s$uo Mass nnwen. Ad iamen win ib$an, ad ijhel win ib$an". Ih, Nhegga d times, i imednas; ad asen zzin ieeoouoa s. Ma ppren d, ad asen ppunefken waman am uzzal ifsin. Ad cwin wudmawen nnsen. A tissit tamcumt, a tanezdu$t tucmip
Ih, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, s tidep, ur Nveggia akafi n win ixedmen ayen ilhan

I wigi, leonanat n Aaden, ddaw sen isaffen ppazzalen. Ad qqnen, dinna, imeqyasen n ddheb, ad lsen iceiiiven izegzawen n leerir, eewcen s ddheb. Ad elen, degs, $ef imieoeen izewwqen. A lebsa laali, a tanezdu$t tumaint
Awi yasen d amedya n sin irgazen. I yiwen, Nefka snat tebeirin n teuoin, Nezzi yasent tizdayin, Nerra iger garasent
Yal tibeirt teppak ed l$ella s, ur ipxuuuu, segs, wacemma. Nesfeggev asif garasent
I$ellet ed ppemoa. Inna i umdakwel is, mi s immeslay: "$elbe$ k taokunt, iffe$ k alag
Idens iman is mi ikcem leonan is, inna: "ur cukke$ ara, d awez$i, ad iqucc wayagi
Ur cukke$ ara ad yili yimir, u ma bbwve$ ar Mass iw, ard affe$, war ccekk, ayen yifen aya, deg umekkan is
Inna yas umdakwel is, mi s immeslay: "day tnekoev Win ik Ixelqen seg wakal, sinna, si tiqqit, sinna, Imessel ik d argaz
Maca, Neppa d Oebbi, Mass iw. Ur pcarake$ yiwen, i Mass iw
Lemmer id tenniv, mi tkecmev ar tebeirt ik: akken Irad Oebbi. Ur telli tezmert siwa s$uo Oebbi. Ma twalav iyi d, nek, tifev iyi ayla, tarwa
Izmer Mass iw ad iyi d Ifk ayen i ifen tibeirt ik. A d Iazen $uoes ssxev, seg igenni, a ppu$al d aeecraruf issiccigen
ne$, ad zzren waman is, ur ten teppafev, d awez$i
Tqucc l$ella s. D$a la izeyyeo ifassen is, $ef wayen iseooef fellas. Tqucc tfeooant is. Inna: "a yamxix iw, a lemmer ur curke$ yiwen, i Mass iw
Ur as illi urbaa ara t isellken, war Oebbi. Ur isellek iman is
Akka, laanaya s$uo Oebbi, Tidep. Yif akw i ukafi, Yif akw i taggara
Awi yasen d amedya n tmeddurt n ddunit. Am aman id Nesse$li seg igenni. Ealualen yissen im$an n tmurt. D$a u$alen d asa$uo, issebruzzaa iten wavu. Ni$ Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ayla akked dderya d ccbaea n tmeddurt n ddunit. Ar Mass ik, leulae idumen ifen ten i ukafi, ifen ten i tmeooiwt
Ass ideg ara Nesseleu idurar, a pwaliv tamurt d aza$ao. A ten Nefser, ur Neppaoa yiwen segsen
A d rsen zdat Mass ik, d leufuf: "ni$ tusam a£ d, akken ikwen Nexleq tikelt tamenzut. Irna tetebbtem ar ur awen Neppara ppaaud, d awez$i

Ters ed Tezmamt. A pwaliv ibe$wviyen s ueebbio, $ef wayen illan degs. Qqaoen: "a yamxix nne$! Acimi tazmamt agi ur teooi ayen meeeiyen, u wayen meqqwoen, armi ten teeseb"? Ufan illa wayen xedmen. Mass ik ur Idennis yiwen

Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem", knant, siwa Iblis. Neppa, si leonun, iaaua lameo n Mass is. Day a ten terrem, neppa akked tarwa s, d imawlan, war Nek? U nitni d icenga nnwen! D abdil ucmit n imednas
Ur ten Rri$ d inagan n lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan, ne$ n lxelq nnsen. Ur Iiife$ im$eooqen d imaiwnen
Ass ideg ara d Yini: "neccdet wid iyI terram d icriken iW". Ad asen siwlen, ur asen d pparan. Nerra, garasen, asif n twa$it
Ibe$wviyen ad walin times. EeEuan ar nitni, degs, ara $lin. Ur ppafen, segs, tisensert
Ni$ Nefka d, di Leqwoan agi, yal amedya, i imdanen. Maca, ipnamar umdan sennig akw
D acu i iiifen imdanen ad amnen, mi ten id tusa nnhaya, u ad ste$foen Mass nnsen? Ar ten id tas kan, tin ivoan d imezwura, ne$ ar d irs, zdat sen, uaaqeb
Ur Neppazen imazanen, siwa i ubecceo d uneddeo. Wid ijehlen pnamaren, s tkerkas, iieggioen yissent tidep. Pmaaliken $ef issekniyen iW, akked wayen i$ef ppunedoen

Anwa idensen sennig win iwumi d pwafekkoen issekniyen n Mass is, iwexxeo asen, u ippu i ixdem ufus is. Ih, Nerra aeurrim $ef wulawen nnsen, ur t fehhmen; akked tiaeegt deg imeeeu$en nnsen. Ma tneccdev ten ar nnhaya, ur pwanhan, d awez$i
Mass ik Ipsemmieen, d Bab ueunu. Lemmer ad Ieud fellasen ilmend n wayen kesben, ad I$iwel ar uaaqeb nnsen. Maca, saan ppaaud, ur ppafen segs tisensert
Timdinin nni i Nesqucc mi densent, Nga ppaaud i usquccu nnsent
Mi inna Musa i uqeddac is: "ur eebbse$ alamma bbwve$ ar umlili n sin ilellen, xas ad saaddi$ tallit
Mi bbwven ar umlili nnsen, ppun aslem nnsen. Iu$al ar yill d ilelli
Mi zegren, inna i uqeddac is: "awi a$ d imekli nne$, ni$ naateb deg inig nne$ agi
Inna: "ur twalav ara, mi nreyyee ar teeout, nek ppu$ en aslem? D Cciian kan iyi isseppun ur ak nni$. Ibbwi abrid is ar yill, d lwehma
Inna: "d ayagi ay neb$a". D$a u$alen d $ef isurifen nnsen
Ufan d amdan seg imdanen nne£, iwumi Nefka aeunu s$uone£. Neslemd as tussna i illan $uone£
Inna yas Musa: "Ma ad ddu$ yidek, ad iyi teseefvev ay tesnev n uuwab
Inna d: "kecc, s tidep, ur tezmioev, yidi, a pueboev
Amek ara tueboev i wayen i$ef ur tesaiv asali
Inna: "ad iyi tafev, ma Irad Oebbi, d aueboi. Ur pnaqwame$ lameo ik
Inna: "ma teddiv yidi, ur iyi d steqsay $ef wacemma, alamma smekti$ k id fellas
Lean, armi rekben di lbabuo. Ixeoq it. Inna: "txeoqev t, iwakken ad $evuen l$aci s! Ni$ ayen txedmev d dduni
Inna: "day ur ak nni$ ara, kecc, s tidep, ur tezmioev, yidi, a pueboev, d awez$i
Inna: "ur iyi pqasa imi ppu$, ur ssukku lwaaoan $ef lameo iw
Lean, armi d mmugren ilemei. In$a t. Inna: "ten$iv amdan ur nen$i yiwen! Ni$ d ayen idensen ay txedmev
Inna: "day ur ak nni$ ara, kecc, s tidep, ur tezmioev, yidi, a pueboev, d awez$i
Inna: "ma steqsa$ k $ef t$awsa, deffir ta, ur teddu yidi. Ni$ ssutre$ ak d ssmae
Lean, armi bbwven ar imezda$ n yiwet n temdint, ssutren asen lqut. Ugin a ten snubgten. Ufan en leiv, qoib ad i$li. Iueggem it. Inna: "ma teb$iv, tzemrev a ppepwaxelluev $ef waya
Inna: "Tura a nemfaoaq. Ad ak d fke$ lmaana n wayen i$ef ur tezmirev a pueboev, d awez$i
Lbabuo nni, n igellilen i ixedmen di yill. B$i$ a t oee$, acku yiwen ugellid, deffir sen, itekkes yal lbabuo, s yi$il
Wanag ilemei nni, llan imawlan is d lmumnin. Nugad ad ieeppem fellasen tinufqa, tijehli
Neb$a ad asen d Irr, Mass nnsen, it yifen: win iufan, iqeoben nezzeh aeunu

Wanag leiv, n sin warrac igujilen n temdint. Illa ugerruj seddaw as, i nitni. Babat sen d argaz ilhan. Mass ik Ib$a, ard im$uoen, ara d ssuff$en agerruj nnsen. D aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ur t xdime$ s lameo iw. D tagi ay d lmaana n wayen i$ef ur tezmioev a pueboev
Steqsan k $ef Bu sin wacciwen. Ini: "ad awen d awi$, fellas, asmekti
S tidep, Nefka yas di tmurt, u Nsehhel as iberdan di yal cci
Iiief yiwen n ubrid
armi sanda i$elli yiiij. Iufa i$elli $ef tala ilu$en. Iufa n $uoes agdud. Nenna: "a Bu sin wacciwen, aaqeb iten, ne$ lhu $uosen
Inna: "win idensen a t naaqeb, sinna, ad iu$al ar Mass is at Iaaqeb aaaqeb unekkao
Wanag i win iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, akafi igerzen. Ad as Nini i isehlen si lameo nne£
Sinna, ilea d yiwen n ubrid
armi sanda d ineqqeo yiiij. Iufa n ineqqeo ed $ef ugdud, iwumi ur Nefki ar at isdarin segs
Am akka. Ni$ ibbwev a£ d akw usali s
Sinna, idda d yiwen n ubrid
armi ibbwev ger sin iediden. Iufa, deffir sen, agdud qoib ur fehhmen awal
Nnan: "a Bu sin wacciwen, s tidep, Iaouo akked Maouo la ssefsaden di tmurt. A k nxelleu ma terriv uuuo garane$ yidsen
Inna: "yif it iyi Ifka Mass iw. Efket iyi afus, ad rre$ uuuo garawen yidsen
Awit iyi d tiqaumtin n wuzzal alamma irgel wayen illan ger idurar". Inna: "uuvet alamma tekker degs tmes. Awit iyi d ad smire$ fellas nneas ifsin
D$a ur zmiren a t id zegren, ur zmiren a t id flun
Inna: "ayagi d aeunu s$uo Mass iw. Mi d tusa lemaahda n Mass iw, a t Isawi. Lemaahda n Mass iw d tidep
Assen, a ten Neoo ad ddehmen wa $ef wa. Auuvu di lbuq, d$a a ten Nessemlil akw
A d Nessken nezzeh Loahennama, assen, i ijehliyen
wid iwumi seurrment wallen nnsen, mgal asmekti W. Llan ur zmiren i usemees
Day $ilen, wid ijehlen, ad rren imdanen iW, d imawlan war Nek? Ih, Nhegga Loahennama, d axxam i ijehliyen
Ini: "ad awen mle$ at igiten imexsuoen sennig wiyav
Wid iwumi iweddeo laatab nnsen di tmeddurt n ddunit, wanag nitni nwan gerzen igi
Widak d wid i inekoen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, akked temlilit yideS. Mean igiten nnsen. Ur ten Nwezzen, ass n tnekra
Atan uqeiii nnsen: Loahennama, imi jehlen, u mmaalken deg issekniyen iW, akked imazanen iW
Ma d wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, axxam nnsen d leonanat n Loennet
Degs ad wekkoen, ur ssuturen ayen nniven
Ini: "lemmer ill d lmidad, i wawalen n Mass iw, ad iqqao yill, uqbel ad fukken wawalen n Mass iw, xas a d nawi i t icban n lmidad
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weeean iyi d ar Oebbi nnwen, d Oebbi Yiwen. Win issaramen timlilit n Mass is, ad ixdem ayen ilhan, ur ipcarak yiwen deg waabad n Mass is
